changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS ( SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 10000) AS sery ) INSERT INTO users ("name", surname, "age", gender, username, "password", inserted_date_at_utc) SELECT 'name' || s.sery, 'surname' || s.sery, RANDOM() * (65 - 14) + 14, CASE WHEN RANDOM() < 0.5 THEN 'MALE'::gender_enum ELSE 'FEMALE'::gender_enum END, 'User' || s.sery, '$2a$12$TwyA3BAycKOqoRohVWBgvOkTutmQzSMcMegm1mIU2zI/1NX0uJmqy' || s.sery, '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'::TIMESTAMP + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30) + 1)::INTEGER * INTERVAL '7 DAY' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 24))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 HOUR' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 MINUTE' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 SECOND' FROM series s
